headline.main: China Seeks to Boost Private Investment in Quest to Maintain Strong Growth
headline.print_headline: China Seeks to Boost Private Investment in Quest to Maintain Strong Growth

lead_paragraph: China will take further steps to support private investment, an official from the state planner said on Monday, as the country looks to maintain strong economic growth while undergoing structural reforms.
snippet: China will take further steps to support private investment, an official from the state planner said on Monday, as the country looks to maintain strong economic growth while undergoing structural reforms....
